title: Galaxy Watch 4 update turns off the lights when you fall asleep, adds custom interval training, more
content:
Samsung’s Wear OS-based Galaxy Watch 4 series is getting another major update this week, with new features including custom interval training, sleep coaching, and more.

more…

The post Galaxy Watch 4 update turns off the lights when you fall asleep, adds custom interval training, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung is rolling out an update to the Galaxy Watch 4 that includes custom internal training, new sleep features, and more.
